attributes.action: allow fixed rate mortgage holders to renegotiate with lender, penalty free.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown advocated fixed rate mortgages over the years. Now I have a £270K mortgage, which is fine. I cant afford it at the moment, but its sucking £1200/mth in interest @ 5.29%. If this was reduced to 3.5-4% if would free up plenty of disposable income for families. Not every one is on a tracker!
